message: Noiz turns toward me, then vaults over the counter.
What?

name: ノイズ
message: "I've got him."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?! Wah!"
Noiz suddenly picks me up.

name: 羽賀
message: "Young men sure are strong these days."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You little...! Put me down, dumbass! What do you think you're doing?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Stop wiggling before I drop you."

name: ノイズ
message: "Sorry. But I'm sure you'll make a fine woman when you grow up."

name: ミオ
message: "Hmph! I don't need you to tell me that! I'll find an even better guy than you in no time!"

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba. Your pulse has spiked precipitously. Your heart is about to burst."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You don't have to announce that!"
...I don't even know what's going on anymore.
I still don't know what happened to that part of me with the power to use Scrap. He might reappear some day, I don't know.
But even if he does, I think I'm gonna be alright.
I have my friends and family. I have Noiz.
Plus, Noiz said that whatever happens to me, he'd think of a way through it.
Not that I intend to take advantage of that offer, but it did make me feel better.
So...
Maybe I can let myself enjoy these normal, peaceful days just a little longer.
